title: Madagascar's Mpox Outbreak Reaches Réunion Island
desc: The Regional Health Agency (ARS) of Réunion has recently confirmed a second imported case of smallpox (mpox) from the Republic of Madagascar to the French Department of Réunion. As of February 10, 2026, the ARS reported that there is no established epidemiological link between this new case and the first case confirmed on January 22, 2026.
